Potion Recipes are Crafting Combinations in Baldur's Gate 3 that include all the combinations of Ingredients needed in order to combine them through Alchemy or Crafting. This page lists all Elixirs and known recipe combinations and their results and products along with their effects. Players can select any individual Ingredient as well to learn more information and how to find or obtain them for Alchemy use.
